thread.section_title: Ticketmaster Resale Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ticketmaster Resale | resale.ticketmaster.com.au
thread.title: Quinn

author: Quinn
title: Quinn
text: Sold 4 tickets through Ticketmaster Resale which is suppose to be reliable and safe - let me tell you, it's not. Over two weeks after selling my tickets I still did not receive any money. I finally called and was given the run around - the staff on the phone were very confused. They told me excuses as to why I did not receive the money, then later in the conversation would admit that they were wrong and confused. I had to request to talk to the manager before I got any clarity, but I still have not received any money and I am not holding my breath.
